Toggle Menu

salt.modules.freebsdkmod

Module to manage FreeBSD kernel modules

available

Syntax

salt.modules.freebsdkmod.available( )

Details

Return a list of all available kernel modules

CLI Example:

salt '*' kmod.available

check_available

Syntax

salt.modules.freebsdkmod.check_available(
								mod
								)

Details

Check to see if the specified kernel module is available

CLI Example:

salt '*' kmod.check_available vmm

is_loaded

Syntax

salt.modules.freebsdkmod.is_loaded(
								mod
								)

Details

Check to see if the specified kernel module is loaded

CLI Example:

salt '*' kmod.is_loaded vmm

load

Syntax

salt.modules.freebsdkmod.load(
								mod,
								persist=False
								)

Load the specified kernel module

Arguments

Name Description
mod

Name of the module to add
persist

Write the module to sysrc kld_modules to make it load on system reboot

Details

CLI Example:

salt '*' kmod.load bhyve

lsmod

Syntax

salt.modules.freebsdkmod.lsmod( )

Details

Return a dict containing information about currently loaded modules

CLI Example:

salt '*' kmod.lsmod

mod_list

Syntax

salt.modules.freebsdkmod.mod_list(
								only_persist=False
								)

Details

Return a list of the loaded module names

CLI Example:

salt '*' kmod.mod_list

remove

Syntax

salt.modules.freebsdkmod.remove(
								mod,
								persist=False
								)

Details

Remove the specified kernel module

CLI Example:

salt '*' kmod.remove vmm
